function.name: CreateParticle
function.signature: int CreateParticle(string particleName, int particleAttach, handle owningEntity)
function.DescriptionCN: 创建一个新的粒子特效

HowToCall.Parameter: string particleName, int particleAttach, handle owningEntity

function.name: CreateParticleForPlayer
function.signature: int CreateParticleForPlayer(string particleName, int particleAttach, handle owningEntity, handle owningPlayer)
function.DescriptionEN: Creates a new particle effect that only plays for the specified player
function.DescriptionCN: 创建一个只对指定玩家播放的粒子特效

HowToCall.Parameter: string particleName, int particleAttach, handle owningEntity, handle owningPlayer

function.name: ReleaseParticleIndex
function.DescriptionCN: 施放指定粒子特效索引号

function.name: SetParticleControl
function.signature: void SetParticleControl(int particleId, int controlIndex, Vector controlData)
function.DescriptionEN: Set the control point data for a control on a particle effect
function.DescriptionCN: 设置控制粒子特效的控制点数据

HowToCall.Parameter: int particleId, int controlIndex, Vector controlData

function.name: SetParticleControlEnt
function.signature: void SetParticleControlEnt(int a, int b, handle c, int d, string e, Vector f, bool g)

HowToCall.Parameter: int a, int b, handle c, int d, string e, Vector f, bool g
